#Text=The Memphis Grizzlies ( 16 - 4 ) defeated the Miami Heat ( 9 - 11 ) 103 - 87 on Sunday at Fed Ex Forum Arena in Memphis .

#Text=Despite only leading 82 - 75 going into the fourth quarter , the Grizzlies were able to out - score the Heat 21 - 12 in the final quarter to give themselves a comfortable 16 - point victory at home .
#Text=Memphis was able to shoot extremely well in this one , as they went 59 percent from the field and a ridiculous 62 percent from the three - point line .
#Text=Miami on the other hand finished at only 49 percent from the floor and 31 percent from beyond the arc .
#Text=In a surprise performance off the bench , Jon Leuer was a big contributor to the Grizzlies superior shooting percentages .
#Text=He went 7 - for - 12 from the field and 2 - for - 3 from the three - point line to score a season - high of 20 points in 23 minutes .
#Text=He also had a season - high of 10 rebounds , giving him his first double - double of the year .
#Text=He 's averaging just over 14 minutes per game on the season , so he was able to cash in on the extra playing time he received .
#Text=Mike Conley also had one of his better games of the season .
#Text=He went a perfect 8 - for - 8 from the field and 2 - for - 2 from beyond the arc to score 18 points in only 27 minutes .
#Text=He had 23 points against the Spurs on Friday and 15 against a tough Rockets team Wednesday , so he 's had a nice stretch of games during the last week .
#Text=Courtney Lee ( 7 - 9 FG , 3 - 3 3Pt ) and Zach Randolph ( 8 - 15 FG , 1 - 1 FT ) also reached double figures in points with 17 apiece .
#Text=Marc Gasol was one of the lone players to struggle offensively , as he had only two points in 27 minutes , but he still had six rebounds and seven assists , so it was n't all bad for Gasol .
#Text=Dwyane Wade had a strong game for the Heat .
#Text=He went 11 - for - 20 from the field and 3 - for - 5 from the free throw line to score 25 points , while also adding six assists .
#Text=He 's caught fire in the last three games , scoring 28 , 28 and now 25 over that stretch .
#Text=Wade is now averaging 22 points and 6 assists on the season .
#Text=Chris Bosh did n't have as big of a game as he 's come accustomed to .
#Text=He scored 12 points ( 6 - 12 FG , 0 - 1 3Pt , 0 - 2 FT ) and recorded only two rebounds in 35 minutes .

#Text=It was his first time in nine games not reaching at least 15 points , and only the second time all season grabbing less than five rebounds , so do n't expect him to have this sort of game again any time soon .
#Text=Mario Chalmers had 12 out of the 19 points from the Heat 's bench , while also notching his second game in row with at least four steals .
#Text=The rest of the bench really struggled , which may have been the deciding factor in this one .
#Text=The Grizzlies ' next game will be at home against the Dallas Mavericks on Tuesday , while the Heat will travel to Phoenix to play the Suns on Tuesday .
